# AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
## `975869abe1331b2db22ac99adfbd357d`
`Mr. CONRAD â€” 22 March 2007`

---


Mr. CONRAD. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee 
on Armed Services be authorized to meet during the session of the 
Senate on Thursday, March 22, 2007, at 2 p.m., in closed session to 
receive a briefing on detention and judicial capacity in Iraq.
